CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: VCI Global Ltd is a holding company. The principal activities of the Company and its subsidiaries are the provision of business strategy consultancy and technology development solution consultancy. The firm organized its consulting services into three main segments: Business Strategy Consultancy; Technology Consultancy; and Others. It derives the majority of its revenue from the Business Strategy Consultancy segment which focuses on listing solutions, investor relations, and boardroom strategies consultancy. It has established a diverse local and international clientele, providing them its services in both local and cross-border listings. Its role begins from pre-listing diagnosis and planning to the finalization of the entire listing process.

value.name: Voon Him Hoo
value.title: Group Executive Chairman & Chief Executive Officer
